metadata.name: Selenitivity
metadata.description:
Animation: @Flipacadabra 
Sound Design: @slowburn22pt5 
--
The winning bidder of this NFT will also receive 2 shipped items:
--
1: The Selenite crystal shown 
2: A Flip Tech-Deck fingerboard, so you can skate your own crystals!
--
When I was 9, I had a rock collection that I'd share with everyone I knew. The selenite I had drew me in like no other, and I was always fascinated by how they were formed and why. 
I thought, "If I could shrink myself and see them larger, maybe I could discover a secret of the universe!"
-Now I'm older, through Flip's eyes I've found a way to bring the micro and macro together. 
This piece is a reminder that if you dream of a world, you can create it in any way you want. 
--
-Some of the largest crystals ever found are of selenite, the largest specimen found in the Naica Mine's Cave of the Crystals being 12 meters long and weighing 55 tons.
- The name "Selenite" comes from Greek selÄ“nitÄ“s (lithos), or stone of the moon, from selÄ“nÄ“ (Moon).
